Package es.gencom.mpegg.io

Interface MPEGWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BitWriter, Flushable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MSBitBuffer, MSBitOutputArray, Payload, WritableMSBitChannel, WritableMSBitStream
    public interface MPEGWriter
extends BitWriter

    MPEG-G bit writer that implements encoding of basic MPEG-G types.

    See 6.3 Specification of syntax functions and data types.
    Author:
    Dmitry Repchevsky & Daniel Naro
